name: Little Big Adventure 2

files.file1:
N/A:Select LBA2 GOG's installer
 Download it here: https://secure.gog.com/downlink/little_big_adventure_2/fr1installer0

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Little Big Adventure 2/DOSBOX/DOSBox.exe
files:
- file1: "N/A:Select LBA2 GOG's installer\n Download it here: https://secure.gog.com/downlink/little_big_adventure_2/fr1installer0"
game:
  args: -conf "..\dosboxLBA2.conf" -conf "..\dosboxLBA2_single.conf" -noconsole -c
    exit
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    description: Installing LBA2
    executable: file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
